methods.getPriority:
A helper for determining the precedence of the loader.

:return: (long) the priority - the lower, the better.
methods.openConfiguration:
Opens the property stream represented by the given name.

:param name: (java.lang.String) - the name of the prop file
:return: (java.io.InputStream) the input stream

text:
A PropertyInputStreamLoader implementation that first searches for the property file as a classpath resource,
 and then via the filesystem. The priority is 100.
